import.takeEffectInfo: All Changes will take effect after pressing the <1>Import</1> button

configFile.formText: The Tour Config File should be named <1>{{filename}}</1>

media.formText: The Images, Videos, etc. which are used in the tour. You can configure the media more precise in the <1>Media Dialog</1>

cleanImport.label: Remove old
cleanImport.formText: Whether you want to remove the old page, media, etc. or keep them
